Class NCLRuleBase<T extends NCLTestRule,I extends NCLImport>

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLRuleBase<T extends NCLTestRule,I extends NCLImport>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement

Esta classe define uma base de regras de teste da Nested Context Language (NCL).

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
